### Synopsis
We analyzed the mtcars R data package to 
### Exploratory Data Analysis
Possible confounders: wt (manual cars might weigh less than auto).
```{r}
data(mtcars)
fit1 <- lm(mpg ~ factor(am), data=mtcars)
summary(fit1)
fit2 <- lm(mpg ~ factor(am) + wt + cyl, data=mtcars)
summary(fit2)
fit3 <- lm(mpg ~ ., data=mtcars)
summary(fit3)
anova(fit1, fit2)
```
